## Error Handling

- Use try/catch blocks for async operations
- Implement proper error boundaries in React components
- Always log errors with contextual information
- Adding missing validations to prevent runtime errors
- Ensuring null/undefined checks before accessing object properties
- Avoiding potential runtime exceptions
- Add proper error handlers where needed to make the code more stable and safe
